title: The Good Boy by Theresa Schwegel
description:
For Officer Pete Murphy, K9 duty is as much a punishment as a promotion. When a shaky arrest reignites a recent scandal and triggers a multimillion-dollar lawsuit, all eyes are on Pete as the department braces for another media firestorm.
Meanwhile, Pete's eleven-year-old son Joel feels invisible. 

His parents hardly notice himÃ¢â‚¬â€unless they're arguing about his Ã¢â‚¬Å“behavioral problemsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½Ã¢â‚¬â€and his older sister, McKenna, has lately disappeared into the strange and frightening world of teenagerdom. About the only friend Joel has left is Butchie, his father's furry Ã¢â‚¬Å“partner.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

When Joel and Butchie follow McKenna to a neighborhood bullyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s party, illegal activity kicks the dog's police training into overdrive, and soon the duo are on the run, navigating the streets of Chicago as they try to stay one step ahead of the bad guysÃ¢â‚¬â€bad guys who may have a very personal interest in getting some payback on Officer Pete Murphy.

Genre: Crime | Mystery | Thriller | Suspense
